import React, {useState} from 'react' import './addPstyle.css' const AddProduct = ({onAdd}) => { const [prod, setProd] = useState({ author:'', name: '', quote: '' }) const submitForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault() onAdd({prod}) setProd('') } return (
setProd(e.target.value)} /> setProd(e.target.value)} /> setProd(e.target.value)} />
) } export default AddProduct
